entity_type.description: The namespace and ID of the entity type the entity needs to have to pass the check.
entity_type.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the entity type the entity needs to have to pass the check.

type.description:
## Entity Type

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/entity_type)

Checks whether the entity is of a specific entity type.

Type ID: `origins:entity_type`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:entity_type",
    "entity_type": "minecraft:creeper"
}
```

This example will check if the entity is a Creeper.
